articles.title: Billboard Argentina
articles.description: LIT Killah, Tiago Pzk, Maria Becerra, Duki, Emilia, Rusherking, Big One and FMK add a fourth week atop the Argentina Hot 100 with “Los Del Espacio.”
articles.content:
The all-star team of LIT Killah, Tiago Pzk, Maria Becerra, Duki, Emilia, Rusherking, Big One and FMK add a fourth week atop the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart as “Los Del Espacio” dominates the July 1-dated ranking.

articles.title: Chevron, Bunge buy Argentina seed business Chacraservicios
articles.description: Chevron's (CVX) Renewable Energy Group and Bunge (BG) said they agreed to acquire Argentina seed business Chacraservicios, adding a new oil source to their supply chains.
articles.content: Chevron's (NYSE:CVX) Renewable Energy Group and Bunge (NYSE:BG) said Wednesday they agreed to acquire Argentina seed business Chacraservicios, adding a new oil source to their supply chains that will help them meet growing demand for lower carbon ren... [472 chars]

articles.title: I Hope to Come Back to India to Play With Argentina And Lionel Messi: Emiliano Martinez
articles.description: With cheers of 'Messi, Messi' reverberating across the stands, the 30-year-old Martinez made a promise to bring Messi to Kolkata again, and to play football in Argentina colours.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi was not there, Emiliano Martinez was. But still, Messi dominated the discourse on a Tuesday afternoon that was reserved for Martinez, who was glad to play ball.
As one of Messi’s most trusted lieutenants during Argentina’s triumphant cam... [4706 chars]

articles.title: Novak Djokovic Registers 29th Consecutive Win at Wimbledon, Serbian Seen Drying Court With Towel Amid Rain
articles.description: Novak Djokovic registered a 6-3, 6-3, 7-6(4) win over Argentina's Pedro Cachin to pick up his 29th consecutive win at Wimbledon
articles.content: Novak Djokovic, the seven-time Wimbledon champion was pushed all the way in his quest for a record-equalling eighth title at the SW19 but he found an extra gear to see off Pedro Cachin 6-3, 6-3, 7-6(4) to move to Round 2 at the centre-court on July 3... [2858 chars]

articles.title: Over 200 Cows Found Dead From Suspected Poisoning at Ranch
articles.description: The incident occurred in a region of Argentina that is experiencing drought conditions.
articles.content:
Around 240 cows have been found dead at a cattle ranch in Argentina from suspected poisoning.
The incident occurred at a farm near the city of Curuzú Cuatiá, in the northeastern province of Corrientes, Argentine newspaper La Nación reported.
The caus... [2772 chars]

articles.description: Manchester City forward Julian Alvarez caught the eye from a very young age back in his native Argentina.
articles.content:
River Plate youth football co-ordinator Gabriel Rodriguez has revealed that needed just ten minutes of Manchester City ace Julian Alvarez's academy trial to make the decision to sign him.

articles.title: Argentina Allows Opening Bank Accounts With the Yuan
articles.description: Argentina is facing a drastic shortage in the US dollar. The local currency peso has fallen nearly 80% against the greenback since the start of 2020.
articles.content:
Argentina is allowing commercial banks to open deposit accounts in the Chinese yuan.
The country is facing a drastic shortage in the US dollar, a major currency used in global trade.
The Argentine peso has fallen nearly 80% against the greenback sinc... [3257 chars]
